transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hi hello.
Customer: Hanji.
Executive: Hanji sir good morning sir.
Customer: Hanji.
Executive: Sir hum Nitish baat kar rahe hain IndiaMART ke service department se.
Customer: Hanji Nitish ji yaar wohi problem aa rahi hai aap dekho yaar usko.
Executive: Toh leads bhi aa rahi hai wait bhi ho rahi hai mere ko.
Customer: Kya time?
Customer: Wohi leads aa rahi hai na jo bulk wali mere paas nahi aa rahi leads koi bhi.
Han.
Customer: Usko dhyan rakho yaar uska phir kaise karenge hum waise toh mujhe mere paas toh kuch main business nahi kar pa raha hu toh main kaise aapko service karu.
Executive: Dekhiye 17 hour ago aayi thi sir fruit light 50 watt ki hai.
Haryana se kya?
Customer: Kahan se?
Executive: Ki requirement top iski toh woh sold out hai na sir sold out ko kya kare hum.
Executive: Sir sold out hai I am interested toh kar sakte hai na usme hota kya hai.
Customer: Main kar raha hu kar raha hu phir bhi main sir baar baar toh kar raha hu usme main jo dekhta hu usme I am interested kar raha hu par woh aa hi nahi rahi mere paas toh.
Apni baat hui apni Friday ko baat hui aaj mangalwar ho gaya paanch din ho gaye abhi.
Hmm.
Customer: Aise toh business haath se nikal jayega toh phir fayda kya hai mere ko service lene ka.
Executive: Kya hai?
Customer: Business mere haath se nikal raha hai mere samne business party nikal rahi hai toh mere ko benefit kya service lene ka.
Executive: Sir uske liye aapko engagement toh rehna hoga na sir jaise aap kehte hain ki bulk ki order nahi aa rahi hai. 
Customer: Nahi aa rahi thi electrical tape ki theek hai 1000 piece ki requirement aayi thi.
Executive: Woh bhi woh bhi sold out hai usko main kya karu sold out hai.
Executive: Woh main maan raha hu sir aap jo bol rahe ho na ki sold out hai toh woh by lead consume ho gayi na sir.
Customer: Kyunki aap nahi waha par.
Executive: Sir aap mere baat kaha par ho main kaha par hu abhi aap.
Customer: Kaise?
Customer: Noida mein ho Delhi mein ho Bombay mein kaha par ho.
Executive: Hum kaha pe hain?
Executive: Hum IndiaMART ke head office se baat kar rahe hain sir.
Customer: Kaun sa location kya hai aapki Noida ki Noida se haan Noida Noida se main aapko bhai ticket bhejta hu mere paas aao aane jaane ka kharcha mera rehne ka vakt mera aap dekho ki mere paas leads aati hai toh. Mere paas toh aati nahi hai mere paas toh paanch mein aati hai bas.
Paanch mein check karta hu toh woh usme mere paas aati nahi hai notification nahi aata notification main dekhta rehta hu nahi aata.
Executive: Aap yeh sab ki by lead use kijiye stainless steel wali jo product hai aapki shining violet wall wali stainless steel subscriber wali.
Customer: Nahi aati toh.
Executive: Yeh sabhi by lead use kijiye sir.
Customer: Nahi hai bhaiya nahi hai aapki toh mujhe kya jarurat hai bolne ki.
Customer: Toh mera dimag thodi kharab hai main aapko bolunga.
Customer: Woh mujhe business milta hota toh main aapko phone thodi karunga yaar main kaun jaan aadmi hu mujhe nahi pata kaise tackle karte hai isko.
Executive: Sir agar aapki by lead jo hai na jaise ki agar nahi aati tab waha pe nahi show hota na sir aa rahi hai tabhi show ho raha hai past lead mein by lead aati hai tabhi show rahi hai.
Customer: Mere paas show ho raha hai sold out bas aap ji iska solution nikal do jyada baat karne ki jarurat nahi hai solution hota hai toh theek hai that's all nahi toh mujhe kya kya karna hai kya nahi karna main consumer court mein kheechta hu aapko bas aur mere paas koi haal nahi hai.
Executive: Kya hai?
Customer: Main consumer court mein case kar raha hu sir aapko.
Executive: Video mein.
Customer: Yaar ek toh pata nahi aapko punjabi samajh aati hai na hindi na english kya main karu yaar aapko. Aapki aawaz clear nahi aa rahi hai sir yeh main bol raha hu.
Customer: Bas ek ab kya bolo kya karna hai.
Aawaz aa rahi hai aapko.
Executive: Haan aawaz aa rahi hai. Bolie.
Executive: Haan bataiye.
Customer: Mere paas bhaiya mere paas jo inquiry aati hai na usme sold out ki inquiry aati hai jisko main click nahi kar sakta iska solution hai aapke paas kuch.
Executive: Sir yeh jaise ki jo sold out hoti hai na waha pe aapko highly engagement rehna hoga sir.
Customer: System mere samne hota hai yaar theek hai mobile pe main dekhta hu paanch minute inquiry aati hai 15 minute pehle toh main usko check karta hu sold out hoti hai.
Customer: Ab meri aankhe main us mobile mein toh fit nahi kar sakta bhaiya.
Executive: Kitne minute mein check karte hain sir?
Customer: 10-10 minute baad check karta hu main.
Executive: 10 minute baad aapke product mein hai sir yeh jo product aati hai kafi sare supplier deal kar rahe hain new delhi ke hain theek hai new delhi ke hain jaipur ke hain gandhinagar ke hain.
Customer: Thodi der mein phone kar raha hu main breakfast karke yaar aapko nahi samajh lag rahi yaar main kya bolna chahta hu aap chhodo yaar main dekhta hu main.
Executive: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving bulk leads.

- Leads showing as sold out.

- Business is slipping away.



Resolution:

- Executive stated customer needs to stay engaged.

- Executive mentioned other suppliers dealing in same product.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, sold out, consumer court, engagement
